segments.text: The kitchen looks busy with everyday chores.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A woman stands by the sink, towel in hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet water fills the basin to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy climbs the stool toward the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl watches him closely, arm raised.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle forms on the floor from the overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stack neatly on the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Window lets in light from the garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool tilts slightly under the boy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their little secret seems fun to them.
segments.speaker: PAR
